scripts.verify: npm run verify:ios && npm run verify:android && npm run verify:web
scripts.verify:ios: xcodebuild -scheme CapacitorBackgroundRunner -destination generic/platform=iOS && xcodebuild test -scheme CapacitorBackgroundRunner -destination 'platform=iOS Simulator,OS=18.6,name=iPhone 16 Pro'
scripts.verify:android: cd android && ./gradlew clean build test && cd ..
scripts.lint: npm run eslint && npm run prettier -- --check && npm run swiftlint -- lint
scripts.fmt: npm run eslint -- --fix && npm run prettier -- --write && npm run swiftlint -- --fix --format
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run docgen && npm run docgen-api && tsc && rollup -c rollup.config.js --bundleConfigAsCjs && npm run build-sdk && ./scripts/copy-native-sdks.sh && npm pack && mv ./capacitor-background-runner-*.tgz ../../ && ./scripts/copy-readme.sh
scripts.pack: npm run build && ./scripts/copy-native-sdks.sh && npm pack && mv ./capacitor-background-runner-*.tgz ../../
